msbt.message: When I'm here, I get this weird urge, like I just gotta scream my lungs out Actually, hang on a sec.<10_10 />YEEEEEAAAAAH!<10_9 />Whew, ! That hit the spot!
I love hanging out in these empty spots. No houses, no nothing You really get a feel for the ISLAND!I hope whoever builds here knows what they're doing, .
If you ever gotta get your head straight, this is an awesome spot to chill, .
Wandering around like this really takes me back. It's so quiet It reminds me of where I grew up.
Whenever my head's in a bad spot, I come out here. A few minutes alone and my troubles justevaporate.
My place is in such an awesome spot. I can't believe how lucky I got. It's PERFECT for my night strolls.
<20_2 arg="10" />Ever been to 's place?<20_2 arg="9" /> I love how 's got it laid out, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It really just FEELS like , y'know?

<20_2 arg="10" />How's tent life treatin' you? Ground too hard?<20_2 arg="9" /> Hey, at least you're close to nature, right, ?<20_3 arg="3" />I guess you gotta love camping to do the tent thing. I was never a huge fan.<20_3 arg="6" />Plus, my back gets SUPER sore when I sleep on the ground.
<20_2 arg="10" />Super cozy place<20_2 arg="9" /> you got here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />So what's next, ? Gonna do the dream house thing?
<20_2 arg="10" />Wow! Your place is big!<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />I mean, I get it. You buy a bunch of stuff, you need to put it somewhere.<20_3 arg="3" /> Still! Impressive, !

<20_2 arg="10" />I caught a rumor about you addin' a room to your place or something.<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />Tell me the truth<20_3 arg="3" />it's a dedicated party room, isn't it? When can we use it, ?
<20_2 arg="10" />Your place looks great! <20_3 arg="6" />Someday you gotta tell me all the house power-ups you're plannin', !
<20_2 arg="10" />Your place is huge!<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I bet you could have the entire island over and still have room to spare, !

<20_2 arg="10" />Your house is GIGANTIC! <20_2 arg="9" />But where does it end? Like, how much house do you need, ?!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sorry, I'm just jealous. Your place is seriously rad. I really wish mine was like it!

<20_2 arg="10" />Did I hear you've got a basement?<20_2 arg="9" /> Do you have, like, band practice down there or something?<20_3 arg="6" />Well, if you ever need a rock star scream, let me know!<20_3 arg="3" /> I'll get the crowd PSYCHED, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Word is 's living in that tent, .<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />I really hope there's a comfy cot in there. <20_3 arg="3" />That ground is HARD!
<20_2 arg="10" />Check out <20_2 arg="9" />the rockin' spot built on!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's totally the PERFECT spot for a house.
<20_2 arg="10" />Ever been in 's place? <20_2 arg="9" />It's AWESOME.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Next time throws a party, I am NOT gonna miss it!
<20_2 arg="10" />Am I completely bonkers or does 's house give off a newly-expanded-on vibe?<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />Hmm<20_3 arg="3" /> I suppose I COULD just knock and ask 'em, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s house is just about the coolest one on .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The only thing it's missing is, like, a monorail, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s place is so stinkin' huge that I'm kinda scared I'd get lost in there!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Promise me if you visit 'em, you'll bring a compass, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You seen 's place? It's, like, bonkers-big. <20_3 arg="6" />It's like something from TV!<20_3 arg="3" />
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I heard 's house just got a new basement.<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Whaddaya think? Is the basement for, like, secret club meetingsor just laundry?

<20_2 arg="10" />Timmy's shop rocks! <20_2 arg="9" />You know, before I moved here, I was worried we'd have to forage and stuff. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, as long as he's sellin', I'll totally be buyin', !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The stuff at Nook's Cranny keeps looking better! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Timmy and Tommy have got some mega business sense!

<20_2 arg="10" />Nook's Cranny's so huge<20_2 arg="9" /> that sometimes I'll swing by just to see what's new, .<20_3 arg="6" />Can you even imagine island life without 'em?<20_3 arg="3" /> We'd totally fall apart!

<20_2 arg="10" />That tent's got a LONG way to go before it's a full-on museum,<20_2 arg="9" /> but it'll happen, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think they said they're gonna start working on a building once they get enough exhibits together.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You checking out Resident Services? Everyone in there's ridiculously helpful, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Like, have you seen the zoning paperwork they have to do when you plonk down a bench? Yikes!

<20_2 arg="10" />Ever get jealous when you see a plane taking off from the airport?<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />Like, THERE'S an adventure that I could be taking<20_3 arg="3" />but I'm not.There's so much world out there, y'know? And I wanna see as much as I can, !
There's something justwarm about the plaza. Everyone's just here doing whatever. Life's happening, y'know?

I love walking through the plaza and saying hi to everyone. It's great for catching up with folks. Like you!How goes it? New shirt? Still digging your place? Bought anything cool lately? Been to any sweet parties?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've loved almost everything I've ever bought at the tailors.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The sisters who run the place rock at picking colors and patterns and styles and stuff that work for me.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Looks like we got a newcomer on the way.<20_3 arg="6" />You all set to rev up the welcome wagon, ?<20_3 arg="3" />

Tons to see, free admission, open 24/7<20_2 arg="10" /> Yeah, our museum rocks.<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I'll go on a late-night stroll and wind up there, gawking at stuff till the sun's up.
The museum's fish exhibit is so super chill. I just kinda bliss out when I'm in there, .That 's got really hypnotic moves. I can't peel my eyes away!

Lately, I can't get enough of that at the museum.I'd kinda like to try raising one at home, butI don't think I'd be a very good bug parent.At least here I can check one out whenever I want, plus it's taken care of by someone that knows what's up.

Y'know, I never thought I'd see
with my own eyes.Just looking at it sends my brain on a wild trip through time. So rad!
